tool_description: API for getting basic country info like name, code, dial-code, flag, currency-code, continent.
name: Country Info
title: Country Info

api_list.name: All Country List
api_list.description:
This API will return all country details from the server. It contains the following info

- Country Name
- Country Code
- Dial Code
- Continent
- Currency Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-info.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search country by country name
api_list.description: This API will return the country info based on the query value which is passing in query string

api_list.name: Get country info by continent
api_list.description: This API will return basic info of a country which is exactly matched with the continent name in param
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-info.p.rapidapi.com/continent/Asia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://country-info.p.rapidapi.com/continent/{continent_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get country info by country code

import requests
